author: vinodkv
msg: HADOOP-9471. hadoop-client wrongfully excludes jetty-util JAR, breaking webhdfs. Contributed by Alejandro Abdelnur.

author: mikem
msg: DERBY-6144 nightly regression test failure, intermittent error : testStatisticsCorrectness(org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.store.AutomaticIndexStatisticsTest)junit.framework.A
back ported change #1467011 from trunk to 10.8 branch
test was asserting that stats had to be created after "now".  I think the
nightly was getting a case where the time was the same.  DERBY-5046 fixed
a different part to the same test to check for greater than now, so implemented
that same fix at the offending line.  Also added some text to be printed with
the variable values if it happens again.
